issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Make math functions support f32
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9891](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9891). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Given a math function `g`, we compute g(f32) using g(cast(f32 AS f64)).

The goal of this issue is to make the operation be cast(g(f32) AS f64) instead.

Since computations on f32 are faster than on f64, this is a simple optimization.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9891?focusedCommentId=17189616) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8089
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8089>
